hooks.command: bash -c 'CMD="$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT"; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git\s+push\s+--force\s+origin\s+(main|master)"; then echo "BLOCKED: Never force-push to main/master" >&2; exit 2; fi; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "rm\s+-rf\s+/[^a-zA-Z]"; then echo "BLOCKED: Refusing rm -rf /" >&2; exit 2; fi; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git\s+reset\s+--hard"; then echo "BLOCKED: git reset --hard is destructive. Use with explicit confirmation." >&2; exit 2; fi; if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git\s+checkout\s+\."; then echo "BLOCKED: git checkout . discards all changes. Use with explicit confirmation." >&2; exit 2; fi; exit 0'

bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -z "$FILE" ]; then exit 0; fi; case "$FILE" in *.py) ruff format --quiet "$FILE" 2>/dev/null ;; *.go) gofumpt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null ;; *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx) prettier --write --log-level silent "$FILE" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; exit 0'

bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -z "$FILE" ]; then exit 0; fi; WARNINGS=""; case "$FILE" in *.py) if grep -n "print(" "$FILE" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "#.*print" | grep -v "logging" | head -3 | grep -q .; then WARNINGS="$WARNINGS
WARNING: print() found — use structured logging instead"; fi; if grep -n "except:" "$FILE" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "#" | head -3 | grep -q .; then WARNINGS="$WARNINGS
WARNING: bare except: found — catch specific exceptions"; fi ;; *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx) if grep -n "console\.log" "$FILE" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "//.*console" | head -3 | grep -q .; then WARNINGS="$WARNINGS
WARNING: console.log found — remove before committing"; fi; if grep -n ": any" "$FILE" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "//" | head -3 | grep -q .; then WARNINGS="$WARNINGS
WARNING: any type found — use unknown + type guards"; fi ;; esac; if [ -n "$WARNINGS" ]; then echo -e "$WARNINGS"; fi; exit 0'
